name: Run Together
public_notice: Run Together (RUN) has recently migrated from their old contract to a new V2 contract. For more information, please view this announcement on Twitter.

description.en: Run Together is built around the activities: walking and jogging - together every day, which is essential for everyone. Users can equip themselves with NFT items which are divided in forms of: - Sneakers - Sportwears - Glasses ... and other accessories, etc. Users can earn valuable tokens in the game as well as trade them for profit by walking, jogging, and running outside. Run Together, which includes a Game-Fi component, aims to motivate millions of people to live healthier lifestyles, to fight the climate change, and connect people through Web 3.0 networks, while also utilizing the App's Social-Fi component to promote user-generated Web 3.0 content.
